title: Swarm Robotics
overview:
Swarm Robotics

Swarm robotics is a field of robotics technology which deals with the artificial swarm intelligence and involves the usage of multiple robots which coordinate among themselves to complete a task more efficiently compared to a single robot carrying out the same task.Swarm robots communicate with each other wirelessly and take decisions.This workshop involves development of autonomous swarm robots enabled with master-slave communication.
schedule:
Schedule

  • Introduction to robot

  • AVR series Microcontrollers

  • Programming AVR

  • Interface of Sensors

  • Actuators

  • Motor drivers

  • Programming and running line following robot algorithms

  • Introduction to swarm robots

  • Wireless communication concepts

  • Working with CC2500 Wireless Transceiver module

  • Programming and running grid solving algorithms on robot

  • Communication between two robots

  • Detecting obstacle on the grid

title: Quadcopter
overview: Quadcopter is an aerial robot combining a simple propeller mechanism with powerful electronics for limitless real-world applications. It is an embedded system comprising of microcontrollers, sensors, flight gear and other integrated components.This workshop helps participants to develop a Quadcopter project from scratch while understanding the various engineering concepts in making a working Unmanned Aerial Vehicle
schedule:
• Fundamentals of Rotor Dynamics.

  • Various components of a Quadcopter.

  • Stability and Control of a Quadcopter.

  • Introduction to Quadcopter Design.

  • Basics of PID tuning.

  • Introduction to Electronics and Sensor calibration.

  • Professional Flight lessons from TechEagle Pilots
particulars:
